Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback is {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

message_win.TRY:
THANKS FOR PLAYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON

landscape.text1: Match any YOUR NUMBER to any LUCKY NUMBER to win the prize shown for that YOUR NUMBER.
landscape.text2: Reveal {img} to instantly win DOUBLE the prize shown for that YOUR NUMBER.
landscape.text3: Reveal {img}to instantly WIN ALL 15 prizes shown.

portrait.text1: Match any YOUR NUMBER to any LUCKY NUMBER to win the prize shown for that YOUR NUMBER.
portrait.text2:
Reveal {img} to instantly win DOUBLE the prize shown for
that YOUR NUMBER.
portrait.text3:
Reveal {img}to instantly WIN
ALL 15 prizes shown.

landscape.text1: Collect 5 hammers {img} from YOUR NUMBERS to trigger the Bonus Round!
landscape.text2:
Bonus Game
Smash the piggy banks to find either coins or buttons.
Find at least 3 coin-filled banks to win a prize! Each additional coin-filled bank increases your prize.
Keep smashing until you win the top prize or find 3 button-filled banks.
